original_text:
Electric Tiger
La slot Electric Tiger fa pensare subito al casinò. Prodotta dalla IGT, presenta dei colori, effetti sonori e una base musicale in perfetto stile casa da gioco. La grafica include anche uno sfondo ipnotico, che a molti potrebbe piacere mentre ad altri no.
Si tratta di una slot moderna, ma che può piacere anche ai giocatori vecchio stile, in quanto vi sono poche funzioni e i simboli richiamano le slot più classiche.
Electric Tiger presenta un RTP compreso tra il 92,35% e il 96,25%.
Grafica della slot machine
Nella slot Electric Tiger si crea un effetto discoteca, con giochi di luci che vanno ad illuminare il display e renderlo dinamico. Tra i simboli compaiono simboli tradizionali come le campane e frutta varia (limoni, ma anche angurie), ai quali si aggiungono i simboli della tigre, la vera protagonista del gioco.
I simboli tigre, ogni volta che appaiono, vanno a ricoprire il rullo in cui escono. Quindi, se ad esempio una tigre si ferma sul quarto rullo, questo viene trasformato subito in un “rullo tigre”, con tre tigri  in verticale.
Il bello deve ancora arrivare: il simbolo tigre è anche il simbolo jolly! Ciò vuol dire che ogni volta che una tigre esce e regala altre due tigri sullo stesso rullo, quell’intero rullo diventa un rullo jolly.
Va detto che non esce molto frequentemente, però quando esce può offrire buoni premi e aiutare nelle combinazioni vincenti su tutte le linee (dato che copre l’intero rullo).
La combinazione di 5 tigri viene pagata 3000 volte la puntata. Questa può sostituire tutti i simboli del gioco tranne i simboli speciali (le stelle).
Le funzioni e i bonus della slot
Le funzioni speciali della slot non comprendono solo il jolly espandibile. Infatti, vi sono altri simboli speciali che vanno a richiamare altre funzioni speciali. Infatti, il simbolo Stella, in qualsiasi posizione sul rullo 3, fa attivare la giocata Bonus regalo.
La funzione Bonus Regalo attiva a caso la funzione Bonus Wheel Shot o la giocata Bonus della Ruota. Tale funzione termina e inizia con la giocata bonus che si è attivata.
Ma in cosa consistono? Si attivano 4 ruote della fortuna più una ruota bonus. Si inizia con 1 giro iniziale sulla Ruota 1. Ogni giro della ruota viene attivato automaticamente e assegna il valore visualizzato. E’ possibile attivare anche un giro della ruota a sinistra o a destra della ruota corrente.
Slot simili a Electric Tiger
Giocare alla slot Electric Tiger può ricordare altre slot sotto due punti di vista: ruota della fortuna e tigri. Chi ha la passione per le ruote della fortuna può provare la slot Wheel of Fortune Ultra 5 Reels (prodotta dalla stessa IGT) che è dedicata completamente alla ruota della fortuna.

raw_translation.response:
Electric Tiger is a slot game that immediately brings to mind a casino atmosphere. Produced by IGT, it features colors, sound effects, and a musical base that perfectly encapsulates the casino aesthetic. The graphics also include an entrancing background that may appeal to some players more than others.

This modern slot game, however, can also be enjoyed by old-school players, as it has few functions and symbols reminiscent of classic slot games. Electric Tiger boasts an RTP between 92.35% and 96.25%.

Graphics of the Slot Machine

In Electric Tiger, a disco effect is created, with light effects illuminating the display and making it dynamic. Traditional symbols such as bells and varied fruit (including lemons and watermelons) appear alongside the tiger symbol, the true star of the game.

Whenever tiger symbols appear, they cover the reel they appear on. For example, if a tiger stops on the fourth reel, it immediately becomes a "tiger reel" with three tigers in a row vertically.

And the best part? The tiger symbol is also the wild symbol! This means that every time a tiger appears and gifts two additional tigers on the same reel, that entire reel becomes a wild reel.

While this doesn't happen frequently, the tiger symbol can offer good rewards and help with winning combinations on all lines (as it covers the entire reel). A combination of five tigers pays out 3000 times the bet and can replace all symbols except the special symbols (stars).

Functions and Bonuses of the Slot

The special functions of Electric Tiger do not only include the expanding wild. There are other special symbols that activate additional features, such as the Star symbol, which activates the Gift Bonus round when it appears in any position on reel 3.

The Gift Bonus round randomly activates the Wheel Shot Bonus feature or the Wheel Bonus round, which begins and ends with the bonus feature that was activated.

So, what do these features do? Four fortune wheels and a bonus wheel are activated. The round starts with one initial spin on the first wheel. Each spin of the wheel is automatically activated and awards the displayed value, and it's possible to activate a spin of the wheel to the left or right of the current wheel.

Similar Slots to Electric Tiger

Playing Electric Tiger may remind players of other slot games that focused on either fortune wheels or tigers. Those with a passion for fortune wheels can also try IGT's Wheel of Fortune Ultra 5 Reels, which is entirely dedicated to the fortune wheel.

Review:
 
Game Overview and Design

Electric Tiger is a modern slot game produced by IGT. It features a casino aesthetic, with entrancing background graphics. The game is available for both old-school and new players as it has few functions and symbols reminiscent of classic and modern slot games. It boasts an RTP between 92.35% and 96.25%.

Tiger Symbol as a Wild and Its Benefits

The tiger symbol is the true star of Electric Tiger slot game. Whenever it appears, it covers the entire reel it appears on. This expands to a "tiger reel," with three tigers in a row vertically. The tiger symbol is also a wild symbol, meaning that anytime it appears and gifts two additional tigers on the same reel, the reel immediately becomes a wild reel. The tiger symbol offers good rewards and helps with winning combinations on all lines.

Gift Bonus Round and Its Two Potential Rounds

The Gift Bonus round is triggered when the Star symbol appears in any position on the third reel. This round randomly activates the Wheel Shot Bonus feature or the Wheel Bonus round, which begins and ends with the activated feature. Four fortune wheels and a bonus wheel are activated. The round starts with one initial spin on the first wheel. Each spin of the wheel is automatically activated and awards the displayed value, and it's possible to activate a spin of the wheel to the left or right of the current wheel.

Possible Rewards and Payouts

A combination of five tiger symbols pays out 3000 times the bet and can replace all symbols except the special symbols (stars). The payout ranges in value from 5x to 150x the total bet based on the betting amount, while the maximum payout prize is 300,000 credits during the base game.

Similarities with Other IGT Slot Games

Electric Tiger may remind players of other IGT slot games that focused on either fortune wheels or tigers. For instance, a passion for fortune wheels can try out IGT's Wheel of Fortune Ultra 5 Reels or Wheel of Fortune On Tour games. These games are entirely dedicated to the fortune wheel, and players can experience the same thrill as Electric Tiger.
